Feb 4 (Reuters) - :
*AMAZON IS EXPLORING AN OFFER FOR PELOTON AND IS SPEAKING WITH ADVISERS ABOUT WHETHER AND HOW TO PROCEED - PERSON FAMILIAR WITH THE MATTER *PELOTON BECAME AWARE OF AMAZON'S INTEREST AND IS CONSIDERING ITS NEXT STEPS - PERSON FAMILIAR WITH THE MATTER *PELOTON HAS NOT YET DECIDED WHETHER IT WILL EXPLORE A SALE - PERSON FAMILIAR WITH THE MATTER *Further company coverage: PTON.O

  • ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;))

((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 04-FEB-202223:07:47 GMT
